extracted_playbook.title: Identify Affected System and Version
extracted_playbook.description: Check if the system is affected by retrieving the installed firmware version and configurations.

extracted_playbook.condition: Is the system affected by the vulnerability?
Is it possible to install the patched firmware immediately?

extracted_playbook.title: Install Patched Firmware
extracted_playbook.description: Install the patched firmware with at least version 1.17.0 to fix the vulnerability. The firmware can be obtained from weidmueller.com.

extracted_playbook.title: Avoid Clicking External Links
extracted_playbook.description: Ensure that authenticated users logged into the product do not click on links from external sources as a temporary mitigation measure.
